data.message:
I would to ask how to re-upload an ID to an account? It ask me to upload an ID for, I think verification purposes, but I uploaded a wrong one, how can I upload another? Every time I login it says "Unfortunately, you won't be able to access your account while we're reviewing these additional documents. We appreciate your patience, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can."
What should I do?

replies.message: Hey Pazzy. You can confirm your identity with Facebook here: http://bit.ly/2mBCfTq. Additionally, you can find the types of IDs we accept here: http://bit.ly/2hz3TLB. -Kiara
Facebook Doyle you pls give me an answer as to when u will fix fb ticker, u are replying to everyone else !!!! Have been asking g for weeks
